issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Seen on ECC after upgrade.

The tools version is: *euca2ools-3.1.0-0.0.196.el6.noarch*

The error, only visible with with {{--debug}}, is:

{code}
[root@ecc-frontend-2 dan]# euca-import-volume /tmp/my-2GB-file --format raw --availability-zone ecc-cluster-1 --bucket test-import-bukket-01 --owner-akid $EC2_ACCESS_KEY --owner-sak $EC2_SECRET_KEY --prefix pref-01 --description "test import with ec2-import-volume, how exciting" --debug

euca-import-volume: error: '_MovedItems' object has no attribute 'urllib'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-import-volume", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.ec2.importvolume.ImportVolume.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 237, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run
    result = cmd.main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/importvolume.py", line 143, in main
    resume.main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/resumeimport.py", line 93, in main
    manifest = self.__get_or_create_manifest(vol_container)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/resumeimport.py", line 123, in __get_or_create_manifest
    vol_container['image']['importManifestUrl'])
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/s3/__init__.py", line 83, in resolve_url_to_location
    parsed_url = six.moves.urllib.parse.urlparse(url)
AttributeError: '_MovedItems' object has no attribute 'urllib'
[root@ecc-frontend-2 dan]# 
{code}
fields.summary: euca-import-volume fails with: '_MovedItems' object has no attribute 'urllib'

comments.body: It needs at least version 1.4 of python-six.  This is fixed in the latest version of the euca2ools packages, including those that ship with euca2ools 3.1.0.
